Name: Majotori
About the game: Lariat the witch will make your wish will come true if you win a game of trivia, but if you lose, something dark will happen instead. How many lives will your ignorance ruin? Majotori is a narratrivia, an original little game that combines an interactive narrative with a quiz game. Features: 25+ characters 50+ branching storylines 1000+ engaging questions for the modern geek 4 question categories (video games, cinema, animation, miscellaneous) with customizable frequency of appearance A character dying a horrible death because you don't watch enough anime
